ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and by the night when it draws in,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by the night as it recedes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and sit during the day, or by the darkening night
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the night when it turns back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And by the night when it `As`as.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the night when it departs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And by the night when it departeth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the night as it approaches,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Night as it dissipates;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the night as it departs;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: by the night when it approaches
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And by the night as it recedes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And by the night as it closes in
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:17] and [by] the night as it approaches, as it falls with its darkness, or [it means] as it recedes;
